description_en: Block google secure DNS, prevent Brook's Fake DNS from not working
description_zh: 阻断 Google 安全 DNS, 避免 Brook 的 虚拟 DNS 不生效

description_en: Block AAAA, if your local or server does not support IPv6
description_zh: 阻断 AAAA, 如果你的本地或服务器不支持 IPv6

description_en: CA needs to be installed. Remove 91porn AD
description_zh: 需要安装 CA。移除 91porn 广告

description_en: CA needs to be installed. Remove iOS YouTube AD
description_zh: 需要安装 CA。移除 iOS YouTube 广告

description_en: CA needs to be installed. google.cn 301 google.com
Instagram has a non-standard dns cache, so we don't use fakedns for it. The domain name may be incomplete, welcome to PR
description_zh: Instagram 的 DNS 缓存不标准，所以不让他走绕过 DNS。域名可能不全，欢迎PR

description_en: CA needs to be installed. Optimize juejin
description_zh: 需要安装 CA。掘金忽略下载app，跳转外部链接继续访问

description_en: CA needs to be installed. Replace google search to soso.ooo on chrome mobile
description_zh: 需要安装 CA。手机端的 Chrome 替换 Google搜索为 soso.ooo

description_en: CA needs to be installed. Optimize zhihu
description_zh: 需要安装 CA。知乎登录弹窗，跳转外部链接
